holidays.title: National Barber Mental Health Awareness Day
holidays.description: It’s time to reverse the roles and ask your barber how they are feeling.

holidays.title: National Devil's Food Cake Day
holidays.description: Rich in flavor and moist in texture, devil’s food cake is a favorite for chocolate-lovers.

holidays.title: National Endangered Species Day
holidays.description: A day to consider the dwindling populations of certain animals and work together to help.

holidays.title: National Pizza Party Day
holidays.description: Pizza's the very definition of a good time and your options are plentiful.

holidays.title: Celebrate Your Elected Officials Day
holidays.description: From your local council person to the president, celebrate them all today.

holidays.title: Frog Jumping Jubilee Day
holidays.description: Find out about what started it all — a day dedicated to jumping frogs.

holidays.title: Hepatitis Testing Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn about hepatitis B and C and encourage individuals to get tested.

holidays.title: Malcolm X Day
holidays.description: Malcolm X Day is celebrated on May 19 to appreciate the civil rights leader.

holidays.title: NASCAR Day
holidays.description: Enjoy the NASCAR event while also helping children across the country.

holidays.title: National Asian and Pacific Islander HIV/AIDS Awareness Day
holidays.description: National Asian and Pacific Islander HIV/AIDS Awareness Day encourages people to get tested for HIV.

holidays.title: National Bike to Work Day
holidays.description: This day aims to incentivize us to switch our regular commute with bikes.

holidays.title: National Chi Day
holidays.description: National Chi Day is here again, so get ready to honor your friends named Chi.

holidays.title: National Defense Transportation Day
holidays.description: Commemorate National Defense Transportation Day by celebrating the ones behind the wheels!

holidays.title: National May Ray Day
holidays.description: With the change in weather, check out how you can make the most of May.

holidays.title: National Mechanical Dry Eye Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn how to recognize and treat the age-related condition known as mechanical dry eyes.

holidays.title: Plant Something Day
holidays.description: Plant Something Day aims to protect and add to the beauty of the environment.

holidays.title: Savitri Amavasya
holidays.description: Get informed about the rituals and traditions of this festival with our great information and tips.

holidays.title: Virtual Assistants Day
holidays.description: Dedicated to virtual assistants, this is a day to recognize their hard work, dedication, and perseverance.

holidays.title: Walk Safely To School Day
holidays.description: Join us as we encourage Australia’s tiny tots to ditch the bus and walk to school.

holidays.title: World Family Doctor Day
holidays.description: This day celebrates the importance and efforts of family doctors in global health care.

holidays.title: World IBD Day
holidays.description: Get ready for some important information about inflammatory bowel disease and its impact on our lives.

holidays.title: JoJo Siwa’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s find out how JoJo Siwa built a sparkly, bow-covered, and expanded empire.

holidays.title: Malcolm X’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s delve into the life and legacy of the fierce civil rights activist Malcolm X!

holidays.title: Marshmello’s Birthday
holidays.description: The unique sound of Marshmello has caught the ears of millions around the world.

holidays.title: Nikocado Avocado’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today, we’re celebrating the famous and successful extreme-eating vlogger, Nikocado Avocado’s birthday.

holidays.description: Orlin Home, born on May 19, 1992, is a popular YouTuber commonly known for his food-related videos. His self-titled channel was created in 2019 and…

holidays.title: Sam Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sam Smith wanted to change what a pop star is, and they did!
